item.title: CVE-2023-6146|2024-08-02T08:21:17.584Z -- qualys -- qualysguard
item.description: A Qualys web application was found to have a stored XSS vulnerability resulting from the absence of HTML encoding in the presentation of logging information to users. This vulnerability allowed a user with login access to the application to introduce XSS payload via browser details.Â
